docs.snippet: J.R. Smith, who will be returning from two knee surgeries, will serve the five-game suspension by the N.B.A. once he is healthy enough to play....
docs.lead_paragraph: J.R. Smith, who will be returning from two knee surgeries, will serve the five-game suspension by the N.B.A. once he is healthy enough to play.
docs.abstract: New York Knicks shooting guard J R Smith will serve five-game suspension for violating NBA's antidrug policy; Smith, who will be returning from two knee surgeries, will serve suspension once he is healthy enough to play.

docs.snippet: The cry grows for more equitable treatment of college football and men’s basketball players....
docs.lead_paragraph: The cry grows for more equitable treatment of college football and men’s basketball players.
docs.abstract: Joe Nocera Op-Ed column notes Time Magazine is only the latest voice to join call for pay and equitable treatment for college football and basketball players; holds case of Texas A&M quarterback Johnny Manziel, who was penalized for signing memorabilia, has become tipping point in public perception of the absurdity of NCAA rules.

docs.snippet: Former U.S. basketball star Dennis Rodman returned on Saturday from his second visit to North Korea this year where he again met the reclusive country's leader Kim Jong-un, but did not come back with jailed American missionary Kenneth Bae....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former U.S. basketball star Dennis Rodman returned on Saturday from his second visit to North Korea this year where he again met the reclusive country's leader Kim Jong-un, but did not come back with jailed American missionary Kenneth Bae.

headline.main: Rodman Back From North Korea, Without Jailed American
